Title: Enacts the "American made flag act" to require that American flags purchased for use by the state government be made in the United States
Summary: Enacts the "American made flag act" to require that American flags purchased for use by the state government be made in the United States.
LawCode: Amd ยง165, St Fin L; amd ยง403, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the executive law, in relation to enacting the "American made flag act"
